title: System Dump. What to do?

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body:
What do I do if this happens and it happens in the middle of a league game and recently it has happened to me more frequently. The game stops and ask if I want create something. If yes =>more than 5mins. and theres a no and cancel options.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=deceit1520,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=jJsEV9FU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-18T10:22:35.222+0000)
>
> im getting that too,

I have a usb3.0 port in used before but I have accidentally damaged one of the pins. So, I used the 3.0 for the case anyway but I think that is why there is the problem. Currently, I decided to keep it unused for now and I think that is the issue for me.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Is there actually a solution for this? I lost 3 ranked games because of this bug. Anyone from RIOT can help?{{summoner:3}}
